QuestData.Title: The Chosen Few
QuestData.Description:
I have need of more val'kyr to join Danica in the battle to come. $n, you are granted the honor of choosing the most worthy.
The strongest will present themselves in challenge at the Circle of Glory. Fight hard, $c, and do honor to your weapons.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the Circle of Glory and fight the val'kyr to determine which are most worthy.
QuestData.RewardText: Well fought. Kolfinna, Dryfinna, and Aeskir have risen to the challenge and await you in Odyn's hall.
